contentrichtext.text: {{Coord|51.6436|-3.4668|format=dms|display=title|region:GB_type:railwaystation}} {{Infobox UK station | symbol = rail| | name = Ystrad Rhondda | code = YSR | image_name = Ystrad Railway Station.jpg | caption = Ystrad Station in August 2008 | manager = [[Arriva Trains Wales]] | locale = [[Ystrad Rhondda|Ystrad]] | borough = [[Rhondda Cynon Taf]] | platforms = 2 | start = 1986 | lowusage0405 = {{pad|1em}} 49,335 | lowusage0506 = {{decrease}} 42,400 | lowusage0607 = {{increase}} 49,434 | lowusage0708 = {{increase}} 72,507 | lowusage0809 = {{increase}} 79,448 | lowusage0910 = {{increase}} 89,868 | lowusage1011 = {{decrease}} 71,720 | lowusage1112 = {{increase}} 75,306 | gridref = SS986948 }} '''Ystrad Rhondda railway station''' is a railway station serving [[Ystrad Rhondda|Ystrad]] in [[Rhondda Cynon Taf]], [[Wales]]. It is located on the [[Rhondda Line]]. There is a dedicated [[rail linc]] bus that links with the train. It is only available to rail passengers and operates to [[Penrhys]], [[Tylorstown]], [[Ferndale, Rhondda Cynon Taf|Ferndale]] and [[Maerdy]]. It was first opened on this site by [[British Rail]] on the former [[Taff Vale Railway]] in 1986.<ref>{{cite book|author=Hutton, John|title=The Taff Vale Railway, vol. 2|publisher=Silver Link|year=2006 | ISBN=978-1-85794-250-7 }}</ref> Alphabetically, it is the last station in the UK. ==Services== Monday-Saturday, there is a half hourly service to {{Stnlnk|Cardiff Central}} Southbound and to {{Stnlnk|Treherbert}} Northbound. There is a two hourly service in each direction on Sundays. {{rail start}} {{rail line |previous={{Stnlnk|Llwynypia}} |route=[[Arriva Trains Wales]]<br /><small>[[Rhondda Line]]</small> |next={{Stnlnk|Ton Pentre}}|col={{ATW colour}} |lightcol={{CV colour|Rhondda}} }} {{s-end}} == References == {{reflist}} == External links == {{stn art lrnk|YSR|CF417RB}} [[File:Ystrad Rhondda Valley view from a DMU geograph-3003100-by-Ben-Brooksbank.jpg|thumb|left|View from a DMU going up the Rhondda Valley in 1962]] {{Cardiff, Newport and the Valleys railway stations}} {{Transport in Rhondda Cynon Taf}} [[Category:Railway stations in Rhondda Cynon Taf]] [[Category:Railway stations opened by British Rail]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1986]] [[Category:Railway stations served by Arriva Trains Wales]] [[Category:DfT Category F1 stations]] {{Wales-railstation-stub}}
